participant_1.background:
My pets are all rescues and they have brought so much joy into my life.
i work at a local party store.
i m angry at my coworker.

i am a lesbian.

participant_2.background:
I try to do my laundry every other day, but I sometimes have to skip a day or two because of my theater commitments.
I remember singing "Intergalactic" with my friends in the car, despite my terrible singing voice.
i dream of becoming a famous actress.
I spend my day trying to stay away from cigarettes and doing things that make me happy.
I take pride in my appearance.

content.text: Pretty good! Just got done doing a long rehearsal for a play. What are you up to?
I'm just hanging out with my pets, they're always so happy to see me.
Aw, that's nice. I love animals too, especially dogs. I have a dog named Oliver.
He's a golden retriever. He's the sweetest dog ever.
I love golden retrievers. They're so fluffy and cute.
Yeah, they're great dogs. I'm so glad I have him.
I'm glad too. What other pets do you have?
I also have a cat named Mittens. She's a little bit of a diva, but she's cute.
Haha, I love cats. They're so funny.
Yeah, they are. They're great pets to have.
I agree. I'm so glad I have my pets. They make me happy.
Me too. I don't know what I would do without them.
